footer.trustHeadline: Podiatrist-led sizing with privacy built in
footer.trustBody: LouhenFit keeps family data in the EU and follows GDPR so every profile stays protected.

banner.body: We’d like to measure how visitors use Louhen so we can improve the experience.

trustCopy.fitGuarantee: [FR] Covered by LouhenFit — free returns, guaranteed.
trustCopy.fitDetail: [FR] LouhenFit protects every order — free returns until it fits.
trustCopy.fitCard: [FR] LouhenFit covers free returns on your first pair so we can dial in the fit together.
trustCopy.gdpr: [FR] Your data is safe — GDPR compliant. We never sell personal data.
trustCopy.gdprDetail: [FR] We store every profile in the EU and you stay in control at all times.
trustCopy.payment: [FR] Your payment is secure. Processed by Adyen with bank-grade protection.

coverage.coveredNamed: [FR] {name} is covered by LouhenFit — free returns on the first pair to get the fit just right.
coverage.covered: [FR] This profile is covered by LouhenFit — free returns on the first pair to get the fit just right.
coverage.notCoveredNamed: [FR] {name} isn’t covered by LouhenFit yet. We’ll guide you with gentle fit tips until coverage expands.
coverage.notCovered: [FR] LouhenFit isn’t available for this profile yet. We’ll guide you with gentle fit tips until coverage expands.
